nodes.description: 7:35am，哈扎尔甘吉蔬菜市场发生自杀式爆炸，造成至少20人死亡、数十人重伤
爆炸导致大部分受害者（蔬菜摊贩）被转移至博兰医学综合中心和市立医院，现场被安全部队封锁
nodes.support_text: the most of the victims were vegetable vendors, who were shifted to Bolan Medical Complex and Civil Hospital

nodes.description: 市立医院接收11具遗体，博兰医学综合中心接收3名伤者
nodes.support_text: According to the Medical Superintendent (MS) 11 bodies were brought to the Civil Hospital, while three victims were shifted to BMC hospital

nodes.description: 警方 DIG 宣布初步伤亡数据：16人死亡、30人受伤，其中8名为哈扎拉社区成员
nodes.support_text: Quetta Deputy Inspector General (DIG) of Police Abdul Razzaq Cheema had confirmed that explosion left 16 people dead and 30 injured. Out of 16 dead, eight belonged to Hazara community

nodes.description: 确认爆炸由隐藏在蔬菜中的简易爆炸装置（IED）引发
nodes.support_text: has said to be caused by improvised explosive device (IED) that had been hidden among the vegetables in the market
Meanwhile, four FC personnel are also among the injured

nodes.description: 总理伊姆兰·汗谴责事件，要求提交调查报告并确保伤者获得最佳治疗
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Imran Khan has condemned the blast at the Hazargunji and summoned a report on it

nodes.description: Medical Superintendent (MS) 将11具尸体运送到Civil Hospital
nodes.support_text: According to the Medical Superintendent (MS) 11 bodies were brought to the Civil Hospital

edges.support_text: the most of the victims were vegetable vendors, who were shifted to Bolan Medical Complex and Civil Hospital
According to the Medical Superintendent (MS) 11 bodies were brought to the Civil Hospital...
根据支持文本中的时序逻辑，运送尸体发生在医院接收伤者之后
Quetta Deputy Inspector General (DIG) of Police Abdul Razzaq Cheema had confirmed that explosion left 16 people dead and 30 injured
Meanwhile, four FC personnel are also among the injured
Prime Minister Imran Khan has condemned the blast at the Hazargunji and summoned a report on it
